Pilar Sepulveda

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/7974710101867307
  • Última atualização do currículo em 26/11/2010

Bachelor in Materials Engineering from the Federal University of São Carlos (1992), Masters of Business Administration (MBA) from the University of Warwick (2010) and PhD in Materials Science and Engineering from the University of Nottingham (1996). Experience in Materials and Metallurgical Engineering, focusing on Ceramics, acting on the following subjects: alumina deflocculation, foaming ceramic suspensions, gelling agents, porous ceramics, bioactive sol-gel glasses and gelcasting. Specialised in administration, strategy and policy for research and innovation Engineering and Physical Sciences Research Council UK (2002-2009). Currently working in research development at the University of the West of England (2010-present). (Texto informado pelo autor)
